Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Foot pound \Foot" pound`\ (Mech.) A unit of energy, or work, being equal to the work done in raising one pound avoirdupois against the force of gravity through a vertical distance of one foot. [1913 Webster]
foot-pound n : a unit of work equal to a force of one pound moving through a distance of one foot
